attributes.action: Restoration of respect for the rule of Law in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This parliament absolves all police officers of the excessive use of force during the period of the riots that occured in the United Kingdom between the 6th August to the 10th August 2011 in recognition of their strength of conviction to the nation, this parliament supports the establishment of monuments of recognition to their courage and respect for the following areas, Tottenham, Tottenham Hale, Wood Green, Chingford, Enfield, Islington, central London, Ponders End, Walthamstow, Bethnal Green, Bromley, Camden, Clapham, Croydon, Ealing, East Ham, Hackney, Lewisham, Peckham, Stratford, Woolwich, Birmingham, West Bromich, Manchester, Salford, Leicestershire, Clapham and Wolverhampton.
